articles.author: Ana Monteiro
articles.title: Much of Gates Foundation’s $200 billion will go to Africa - The Seattle Times
articles.description: Africa is set to be the largest beneficiary of the $200 billion that the Gates Foundation plans to give away over the next two decades, co-founder Bill Gates said.
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) Africa is set to be the largest beneficiary of the $200 billion that the Gates Foundation plans to give away over the next two decades, co-founder Bill Gates said.
